name: Night Of Darkness
description:
Description

In a remote village, inhabitants started to disappear one by one and the number of monster in the dark forest in its neighborhood is quickly increasing.
An adventurer decided to step in and protect his village.

In this 10 levels 2D platformer game, make decisions quickly, don't give up on fear, guide our hero to the right path and eliminate all obstacles between him and his goal.

You can use the keyboard or a controller, press Ctrl any time to show or hide the commands map.

System Requirements

CPU : At least Dual Core
Video Card: VRAM 256 MB +
Memory: RAM 512 MB +
DirectX: 9.0 +
HDD: At least 150 MB available
Others: Resolution 960x540
